channel.title: Formula 1 on Haojin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Formula 1 on Haojin's Blog

item.title: March Madness!
item.description: Well the true March Madness we lost. But we are the final four!

item.title: F1 2021 Review
item.description: What a drive! 早上八点钟就爬起来，静候F1 2021年的最后一场大奖赛——阿布扎比亚斯码头。作为这个暑假才爱上的运动，能够在第一个入坑的赛季就赶上如此激烈、意义非凡的一季，实属幸运。

item.title: A perfect event
item.description: A fantastic and amazing event that I will never forget I was in the front of the lobby hanging our robot with my teammate
